Text:
Please upload an x264 version of this!! The Xvid codec is far inferior in image quality to x264. The Xvid codec results in lots of artifacts and blocking. An x264 upload of similar file size would look much nicer. Thank you!!

V: 5
A: 8

Objective research stating that x264 is far superior to Xvid-AFG, in terms of image quality:

http://compression.ru/video/codec_comparison/h264_2011/

An Xvid video needs to have double the bitrate (i.e. filesize) for a similar image quality as an x264 video.
